meta.description: Optimize the number of machines A and B used in a factory to minimize the total number of machines while meeting production and energy constraints.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of machines in the factory

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Number of items each machine can produce per day

params.name: energy_consumption
params.description: Energy consumption in kWh per machine per day

params.name: max_energy
params.description: Maximum energy available per day in kWh

params.name: min_items
params.description: Minimum number of items to produce per day

params.name: max_percentage_B
params.description: Maximum percentage of machines that can be of type B

params.name: min_machines_A
params.description: Minimum number of machines of type A to be used

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of machines of each type to be used

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of machines used

constraints.name: production_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 items are produced per day

constraints.name: energy_limit
constraints.description: Ensure energy consumption does not exceed 3000 kWh per day

constraints.name: max_machines_B
constraints.description: At most 30% of the machines can be of type B

constraints.name: min_machines_A
constraints.description: At least 5 machines of type A should be used
